get.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection. Default 1

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Default 10

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Limit response to resources published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.

parameters.name: author_exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Limit response to resources published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes specific ids.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Ensure result set includes specific ids.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending. Default desc

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Sort collection by object attribute. Default date

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts with a specific slug.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned a specific status.Default publish

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Use WP Query arguments to modify the response; private query vars require appropriate authorization.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

parameters.name: date_gmt
parameters.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The A password to protect access to the post.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts with a specific slug.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned a specific status.Default publish

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title for the object.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content for the object.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.

parameters.name: excerpt
parameters.description: The excerpt for the object

parameters.name: featured_media
parameters.description: The id of the featured media for the object.

parameters.name: comment_status
parameters.description: Whether or not comments are open on the object

parameters.name: ping_status
parameters.description: Whether or not the object can be pinged.

parameters.name: sticky
parameters.description: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky.

parameters.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.

parameters.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.

email.description: The email address for the resource.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the resource.

capabilities.description: All capabilities assigned to the resource.

extra_capabilities.description: Any extra capabilities assigned to the resource.

status.description: A named status for the object.

author_avatar_urls.description: Avatar URLs for the object author.

private.description: Whether posts with this resource should be private.

protected.description: Whether posts with this resource should be protected.

public.description: Whether posts of this resource should be shown in the front end of the site.

queryable.description: Whether posts with this resource should be publicly-queryable.

show_in_list.description: Whether to include posts in the edit listing for their post type.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.

show_cloud.description: Whether or not the term cloud should be displayed.

status.description: A named status for the object.

force.name: force
force.description: Whether to bypass trash and force deletion.

context.name: context
context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

page.name: page
page.description: Current page of the collection. Default 1

per_page.name: per_page
per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Default 10

search.name: search
search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.name: after
after.description: Limit response to resources published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

author.name: author
author.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.

author_exclude.name: author_exclude
author_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.

before.name: before
before.description: Limit response to resources published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.name: exclude
exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific ids.

include.name: include
include.description: Ensure result set includes specific ids.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.name: order
order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending. Default desc

orderby.name: orderby
orderby.description: Sort collection by object attribute. Default date

slug.name: slug
slug.description: Limit result set to posts with a specific slug.

status.name: status
status.description: Limit result set to posts assigned a specific status.Default publish

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Use WP Query arguments to modify the response; private query vars require appropriate authorization.

categories.name: categories
categories.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

password.name: password

featured_media.description: The id of the featured media for the object.

comment_status.name: comment_status
comment_status.description: Whether or not comments are open on the object

ping_status.name: ping_status
ping_status.description: Whether or not the object can be pinged.

sticky.name: sticky
sticky.description: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky.

parent.name: parent
parent.description: The id for the parent of the object.

menu_order.description: The order of the object in relation to other object of its type.

template.name: template
template.description: The theme file to use to display the object.

parent_exclude.name: parent_exclude
parent_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific ids.

post.name: post
post.description: The id for the associated post of the resource.

alt_text.name: alt_text
alt_text.description: Alternative text to display when resource is not displayed.

author_email.name: author_email
author_email.description: Limit result set to that from a specific author email. Requires authorization.

karma.name: karma
karma.description: Limit result set to that of a particular comment karma. Requires authorization

hide_empty.name: hide_empty
hide_empty.description: Whether to hide resources not assigned to any posts.

last_name.name: last_name
last_name.description: The last name for the resource.

first_name.name: first_name
first_name.description: The first name for the resource.

username.name: username
username.description: The user name for the resource.

type.description: Limit result set to comments assigned a specific type. Requires authorization. Default comment

mime_type.description: Alternative text to display when resource is not displayed.
